src:
Hero MotoCorp sales dip 18% in October
The company had sold 7,34,668 units in the same month last year, it said in a statement.
01 Nov 2019 by PTI
Two-wheeler market leader Hero MotoCorp on November 1 reported 18.43 per cent decline in total sales at 5,99,248 units in October.
The company had sold 7,34,668 units in the same month last year, it said in a statement.
"The despatch numbers for the month of October reflect our conscious efforts at further correcting dealer inventories," Hero MotoCorp Head of Sales, After-Sales & Parts Sanjay Bhan said.Special Thursday Expiry on 10th 7th NovEarly Closure to The Great Diwali Discount. Last Chance to get Moneycontrol PRO for a year @ Rs. 289/- only Coupon code: DIWALI
